thread.title: EFSF waives certain rights under loan agreement with Greece (ESM - European Stability Mechanism)
thread.title_full: EFSF waives certain rights under loan agreement with Greece (ESM - European Stability Mechanism) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: EFSF waives certain rights under loan agreement with Greece (ESM - European Stability Mechanism)
text: ( Source : ESM - European Stability Mechanism ) The EFSF Board of Directors has today decided to waive the EFSF's rights under the loan agreements with Greece with respect to events of default which were triggered when Greece missed certain
